info.name: Push Notifications API V2
info.description: API endpoints for push notification management including token registration, sending notifications, and retrieving notification history

request.description: Retrieve notification history for a specific tenant. Returns the most recent notifications with optional limit parameter.

response.name: Success - All Notifications
response.body:
{
  "meta": {
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Notification history retrieved successfully"
  },
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "notif-001",
      "tenantId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
      "title": "New Donation Received",
      "body": "You received a donation of Rp 100,000",
      "category": "DONATION",
      "data": {
        "donationId": "don-123",
        "amount": 100000,
        "donorName": "John Doe"
      },
      "imageUrl": "https://example.com/donation-icon.png",
      "sentAt": "2025-11-25T10:30:00.000Z",
      "readAt": null,
      "deliveredCount": 1,
      "failedCount": 0,
      "createdAt": "2025-11-25T10:30:00.000Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "notif-002",

      "category": "DONATION",
      "data": {
        "donationId": "don-122",
        "status": "PAID"
      },
      "imageUrl": null,

      "failedCount": 0,
      "createdAt": "2025-11-25T09:15:00.000Z"
    },
    {

      "body": "Your shift has started. Have a great day!",
      "category": "SHIFT",
      "data": {
        "shiftId": "shift-789",
        "startTime": "2025-11-25T08:00:00.000Z"
      },
      "imageUrl": null,
      "sentAt": "2025-11-25T08:00:00.000Z",
      "readAt": "2025-11-25T08:01:00.000Z",
      "deliveredCount": 1,
      "failedCount": 0,
      "createdAt": "2025-11-25T08:00:00.000Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "notif-004",
      "tenantId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
      "title": "Low Stock Alert",
      "body": "Product 'Coffee Beans' is running low (5 units left)",
      "category": "SYSTEM",
      "data": {
        "productId": "prod-456",
        "productName": "Coffee Beans",
        "currentStock": 5,
        "minStock": 10
      },
      "imageUrl": null,
      "sentAt": "2025-11-24T18:30:00.000Z",
      "readAt": null,
      "deliveredCount": 2,
      "failedCount": 0,
      "createdAt": "2025-11-24T18:30:00.000Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "notif-005",
      "tenantId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
      "title": "Subscription Expiring Soon",
      "body": "Your Premium subscription will expire in 3 days",
      "category": "SUBSCRIPTION",
      "data": {
        "subscriptionId": "sub-999",
        "expiryDate": "2025-11-28T23:59:59.000Z",
        "daysRemaining": 3
      },
      "imageUrl": null,
      "sentAt": "2025-11-24T10:00:00.000Z",
      "readAt": "2025-11-24T11:30:00.000Z",
      "deliveredCount": 1,
      "failedCount": 0,
      "createdAt": "2025-11-24T10:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ]
}

query.description: Filter by notification category (DONATION, ORDER, SHIFT, ATTENDANCE, SUBSCRIPTION, SYSTEM, ANNOUNCEMENT, MARKETING)

request.description: Retrieve notification history filtered by a specific category. Useful for showing donation-only notifications, shift notifications, etc.

response.name: Success - Donation Category
response.body:
{
  "meta": {
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Notification history retrieved successfully"
  },
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "notif-001",
      "tenantId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
      "title": "New Donation Received",
      "body": "You received a donation of Rp 100,000 from John Doe",
      "category": "DONATION",
      "data": {
        "donationId": "don-123",
        "amount": 100000,
        "donorName": "John Doe",
        "status": "PAID"
      },
      "imageUrl": "https://example.com/donation-success.png",
      "sentAt": "2025-11-25T10:30:00.000Z",
      "readAt": null,

    },
    {
      "id": "notif-002",

    {

      "data": {

        "amount": 75000,
        "status": "FAILED",

      },
      "imageUrl": null,

      "readAt": "2025-11-24T16:25:00.000Z",
      "deliveredCount": 1,
      "failedCount": 0,
      "createdAt": "2025-11-24T16:20:00.000Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "notif-004",
      "tenantId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
      "title": "Donation Payment Expired",
      "body": "Donation payment link has expired",
      "category": "DONATION",
      "data": {
        "donationId": "don-126",
        "amount": 25000,
        "status": "EXPIRED"
      },
      "imageUrl": null,
      "sentAt": "2025-11-24T14:00:00.000Z",
      "readAt": null,
      "deliveredCount": 1,
      "failedCount": 0,
      "createdAt": "2025-11-24T14:00:00.000Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "notif-005",
      "tenantId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
      "title": "Large Donation Received!",
      "body": "Amazing! You received a donation of Rp 1,000,000 from Anonymous",
      "category": "DONATION",
      "data": {
        "donationId": "don-127",
        "amount": 1000000,
        "donorName": "Anonymous",
        "status": "PAID",
        "isLarge": true
      },
      "imageUrl": "https://example.com/celebration.png",
      "sentAt": "2025-11-23T11:15:00.000Z",
      "readAt": "2025-11-23T11:16:00.000Z",
      "deliveredCount": 2,
      "failedCount": 0,
      "createdAt": "2025-11-23T11:15:00.000Z"
    }
  ]
}

response.name: Success - Order Category
response.body:
{
  "meta": {
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Notification history retrieved successfully"
  },
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "notif-010",
      "tenantId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
      "title": "New Order #ORD-001",
      "body": "You have a new order for Rp 45,000",
      "category": "ORDER",
      "data": {
        "orderId": "ORD-001",
        "orderNumber": "#ORD-001",
        "totalAmount": 45000,
        "status": "PENDING"
      },
